T02D3251:14b-1: ma h'a pra ti sa r'a s'a dha na /
T02D3251:14b-3: so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3251:14b-4: se sor 'brang ma chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3251:14b-5: sngar bshad pa'i bya ba'i rim pas stong pa nyid
T02D3251:14b-6: bsgoms pa'i mjug thogs su yi ge aa las byung
T02D3251:14b-7: ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge pram ser
T02D3251:14b-8: po'i 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pas gzhan gyi
T02D3251:14b-9: don byas nas yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan
T02D3251:14b-10: 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mor skad cig
T02D3251:14b-11: gis bdag nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
T02D3251:14b-12: sku mdog ser mo zhal bzhi ma /
T02D3251:14b-15: zhal dang po ni ser ba'o //
T02D3251:14b-17: nub kyi ni mthing nag go ;
T02D3251:14b-19: g-yas pa'i phyag rnams kyis ni ral gri dang mdung rtse gsum pa dang mda' bsnams pa'o //
T02D3251:14b-20: g-yon pa'i phyag rnams kyis ni mdung dang gzhu dang zhags pa dang rdo rje'o //
T02D3251:14b-21: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan la rol cing
T02D3251:14b-22: bskyod pas legs par bzhugs pa 'od zer dmar po'i
T02D3251:14b-24: rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3251:14b-25: na bza' rnam pa sna tshogs kyi stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang 'od kyi stod shag mnabs pa /
T02D3251:15a-0: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa ste de lta bur rnam par @15a * //
T02D3251:15a-1: bsam la de nas sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
T02D3251:15a-2: zla ba la aom dang a'a:dang h'um gi yi ge
T02D3251:15a-3: gsum dkar po dang ser po dang mthing nag tu
T02D3251:15a-5: de nas nu ma gnyis kyi bar du zla ba
T02D3251:15a-6: la gnas pa'i yi ge pram rnam par bsam par
T02D3251:15a-7: bya zhing lha rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis
T02D3251:15a-8: bdag nyid mchod par yang bltas la /
T02D3251:15a-9: ji srid du skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3251:15a-10: skyo bar gyur na ni rang gi snying ga'i zla
T02D3251:15a-11: ba la phreng ba dmar po lta bur sngags blta
T02D3251:15a-13: aom ma ni dha ri badzra ni mah'a pra ti s'a re h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3251:15a-14: so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs so ;
